mapper.select: SELECT info.car_info_id, info.model_name, info.car_num, info.manufacture_year, info.mileage, info.fuel_type, info.car_price, info.previous_registration_fee, info.maintenance_cost, info.agency_fee, img.image_url FROM information info JOIN image img ON info.car_info_id = img.car_info_id WHERE info.car_info_id = #{carInfoId}
